review:
i love the movie because

1)zombies
2)comedy and not comedy that involves cheap mimicry or fun regarding people's accents or religions, 

they go to some adult jokes as well

also the movie has a desi feel to it.
the characters and the movie development is top notch

the film will give you perhaps all feelings
 rofl jokes, some nice thrill,moments of pure happiness (khushamadeeed),friendship,some flirting stuff ,some typical zombie movie tears(oh he's bit and we'll have to leave him),badass shooting and what not

so to summarize the movie,the characters and the chemistry between them, zombies and humour would keep you entertained all throughout the film

genuinely funny scenes and dialogues without a lot of cheap comedy but saif's portrayal of a biracial russian-indian threw me off a little bit. it was just weird because he reminded me of chuck norris for some reason. the accent was a bit over but i didn't mind it on the whole. you don't go into a zombie flick expecting behtareen cinema.

it's far better than big budget comedy films and moreover film story and script writing was the top notch, n specially kunal khemu  comic timing was hilarious he is superb don't why people don't cast him anymore n saif was outstanding in his russian big muscle guy, overall movie is fab n still it's worth watching n hope they will make a sequel of it

rating:7/10

let me get straight to the story .story sucks and kind of messy. but the comical relief and rom-com kind of scenerios really made me laugh. 

pros

comedy, action,acting

cons

story is rather loosely bounded,often depicts typical bollywood movies saying"protagonists won't die no matter what!".
in some parts the story seemed itself flawed.

i'm gonna say only this much.
if you didn't watch this movie you loose the best horror comedy of bollywood.
stop wasting time and go watch it now.
loved it . very relatable characters🔥🔥

the was good in terms of concept ,screenplay,bgm, comedy scenes. you can watch for just a time pass but keep your expectations in limit as there were most of the scenes in the movie which made the movie stretchy. 
ratings:6/10

if asked i will rate it 4 of 5 'coz it is the only zombie movie of india and will rate 3.5 of 5 'coz the story could be more interacting...

and i hope this is not going to be the end of the series... will love to see if is continued from where it was paused...

want the #nextpart
i watched this movie thrice and every single time i watched it i never stop laughing it’s a sheer masterpiece. one of my favourite movies love it🔥

i didn’t like the story of the movie and ya it was little bit boring too! at first i thought the movie will be better than zombie land but no the movie is not at all better. the storyline is not good little adventure in the movie and that’s all nothing really good
just outstanding !unbelievable#what can i say about this charm! just fantastic@kunal khemu@love you a lot handsome👏👍👌✌💑🙌🙋😀💐💟
the movie is simply awesome. the comedy and the storyline is so powerful that you can't put your eyes elsewhere other that your screen. waiting for the sequel.

this film left me amused.it was a bold step in indian cinema with lots of violence and swearing.but dont get it wrong.the movie is a good watch.the violence leaves you open mouthed..while..the comedy just leaves you laughing.watch this one..its good.

however keep it out of reach of kids.

love to watch saif  and kunal acting on top.

saif new look was awesome.

love to watch the movie again n again.
